function NPC_7121210:Init( NPCID ) NPC_7121210.BufIdRegen = 82000 NPC_7121210.BufIdInvincible = 80140 NPC_7121210.TalIdBurrow = 211306902 NPC_7121210.TalIdUnburrow = 211306901
NPC_ReserveUserData( NPCID, 1 ) -- fleeNumber 0~1 NPC_7121210.FleeMarker = {14,15} end
function NPC_7121210:Flee( ThisNPC, Enemy ) local fleeNumber = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 1 )
if fleeNumber > 2 then return end fleeNumber = fleeNumber + 1 ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_7121210.BufIdInvincible ) --ThisNPC:Say("으악 :"..NPC_7121210.FleeMarker[fleeNumber].." : "..fleeNumber) ThisNPC:MoveToMarker( NPC_7121210.FleeMarker[fleeNumber] ) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_7121210.TalIdBurrow ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 1, fleeNumber ) ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_7121210.BufIdInvincible ) --ThisNPC:Say("Flee") end
function NPC_7121210:OnTimer( Index ) --GLog( "OnTimer" .. this:GetMode() .. "\n") if this:GetMode() == 1 then --GLog( "Unburrow\n" )
this:UseTalentSelf( NPC_7121210.TalIdUnburrow ) end end
function NPC_7121210:OnFinishBurrow( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC(ThisActor) ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_7121210.BufIdRegen ) ThisNPC:SetTimer( 1 , 6 , false ) end
function NPC_7121210:OnFinishUnburrow( ThisActor, Enemy ) ThisActor:RemoveBuff( NPC_7121210.BufIdRegen ) end
function NPC121210_ProcessAccDamage( HitInfo ) local BongBong = AsNPC( HitInfo.Victim ) if BongBong:GetMode() == 1 and ChkMFForHitReaction( HitInfo ) then --GLog( "BongBong Acc Damage\n" )
--[[ HitInfo.MF:Adjust( MF_BEATEN, -100, 0 ) HitInfo.MF:Adjust( MF_KNOCKBACK, -100, 0 ) HitInfo.MF:Adjust( MF_STUN, 100, 2000 ) HitInfo.MF:Adjust( MF_THROWUP, -100, 0 ) HitInfo.MF:Adjust( MF_KNOCKDOWN, -100, 0 ) HitInfo.MF:Adjust( MF_UPPERED, -100, 0 ) --]]
--_LogHitInfo( HitInfo )
BongBong:RemoveBuff( NPC_7121210.BufIdRegen ) BongBong:SetTimer( 2 , 2 , false ) end
return HitInfo end
function NPC_7121210:OnHitCapsule_1_0( HitInfo )
return NPC121210_ProcessAccDamage( HitInfo ) end
